svg.text: jsgui3-html ‚Äî "Premium Luna" Design System: The Best of XP/7 ‚Äî Enhanced
Same visual language, but more refined gradients, richer shadows, smoother curves, better typography

g.text: To: James Richardson ‚Äî Today at 10:22 AM
Great progress on the UI controls! The new Month View
looks excellent. I've reviewed the range selection and
multi-select features ‚Äî both work smoothly now.
Can we schedule a demo for the team next Tuesday?

svg.text: ‚Ä¢ Same XP/7 "split gradient" technique, but with smoother gradients, softer borders, and richer color stops
‚Ä¢ Full color family: Primary (blue), Success (green), Danger (red), Warning (amber), Accent (purple), plus warm orange hover on everything
‚Ä¢ Pill buttons, segmented controls, icon buttons, search fields ‚Äî all using the same gloss/split-gradient DNA as classic Windows but refined
‚Ä¢ Window chrome uses translucent glass with inner white stroke ‚Äî like Aero but warmer and more tactile than Microsoft's original
